description:
***FLASH SALE $10: Use the coupon code: T Q R (without spaces between the letters) to get this course only for $10 (50% OFF). This special offer is valid only for 2 Days. Be sure to check it out before it expires!***

This course focuses on building website skills from the scratches. We begin from the basics to intermediate level. In this Dreamweaver tutorial we will also discuss the entire course including the two projects we'll be working on in Dreamweaver CS6. 

*It is completely optional to Purchase the Project Files for the Project.*

Requirements: Adobe Dreamweaver CS6 Software.

Target Audience: Anyone interested in designing websites using Dreamweaver CS6

What am I going to get from this course?

  • To introduce users to the features and tools in Adobe Dreamweaver CS6
  • To teach students how to create beautiful, functional websites in Dreamweaver
title: Adobe Dreamweaver CS6 - Beginner to Professional
